content: Unlike the Drinks in the game and the Gourd itself, Soaks can't be upgraded at the Shen Monkey Vendor, so you are stuck with this small poison resistance buff throughout the game if you have it equipped. So, be sure to head back to the Shen Monkey Vendor at any point if you do want to change your Soak or how your Gourd behaves.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Gall_Gem.md', within the main section titled 'Gall Gem'.
The content is as follows:
Unlike the Drinks in the game and the Gourd itself, Soaks can't be upgraded at the Shen Monkey Vendor, so you are stuck with this small poison resistance buff throughout the game if you have it equipped. So, be sure to head back to the Shen Monkey Vendor at any point if you do want to change your Soak or how your Gourd behaves.
